name: Native Development Kit (NDK)
short_description: The NDK (Native Development Kit) is an add-on to any Windows NT based project using the DDK, PSDK and IFS, providing a full suite of additional headers giving the developers access to all exported Kernel and Native APIs which are not officially documented
